formattedAddress: Upper East Side, Manhattan NYC, Grooming by appointments, New York, NY 10028, USA
adrFormatAddress: Upper East Side, Manhattan NYC, Grooming by appointments, New York, NY 10028, USA

originalText.text: Took my dog for the first time for a nail trim. The lady, not sure if owner or not, was kind of rude and short with me. Gave me a form to fill out that was so poorly printed out that I could barely even read. She abruptly took the dog leash from my hand and took the dog away quickly without even letting the dog warm up to her. I was able to watch her clip his nails which I was glad for and she did a nice job on that. As a final treat, as I am paying for the service, I see a roach walking over her cash drawer. NEVER AGAIN. Unfortunately I do not recommend this place if you are looking for a reliably clean and professional dog groomer with a warm and loving manner.

Unfortunately I do not recommend this place if you are looking for a reliably clean and professional dog groomer with a warm and loving manner.

originalText.text:
Brought my pitbull here multiple times to get his nails trimmed in the past. All of a sudden they started treating me rudely and refused to tend to my dog.

This was rather strange as I had come here before in the past multiple times for a simple procedure.

They have refused entry to their stores multiple times now. Clear lack of professionalism. Not to mention whenever I have went to their stores, they have at least 2-3 staff, and yet no one is able to tend to my dog.

I wouldn't recommend this "groomer" to anyone in the city. They overcharge for work that is done with minimal effort and lack of enthusiasm.

originalText.text: Marina, who used to be on E. 89th St. and is now part of Howies, is hands-down the best groomer we have ever had for our dog! And he is a little guy and we were always nervous with how someone would be with him. Unfortunately for him, and for us, she was the 3rd Groomer that we found about 6 years ago. He is a Shih Tzu poodle mix so has tons of hair. She is a true pet lover and very caring. She is extremely attentive to detail and very committed to taking care of our dog’s needs. Her prices are extremely reasonable and she is solid. Cannot imagine going to anyone else!

originalText.text: Really wanted to like this place, but the woman on the phone was extremely rude. First time she hung up on me, second time she said there was no time for me to bring my cat in for a nail trim, which takes approximately 30 seconds to do. They also seem to charge more than other groomers in the area and aren't always open during business hours.

originalText.text: Very happy I found this place, they did a good job with my poppy and best price in town.
